Sentence.sentence: Now, she attributes much of her understanding of college to that: But once I got to campus, it was a completely different ball game that no one really prepared me for.
Bates College in Maine and Ball State University in Indiana are among other colleges offering three-year options.
Now, she attributes much of her understanding of college to that: "But once I got to campus, it was a completely different ball game that no one really prepared me for."
Sentence.come: 2015年12月六级真题（第三套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: So guess where the ball will go?
Sentence.come: 2017年6月六级真题（第二套）听力 Section B

Sentence.sentence: That means when a golfer tells himself "Don't hit the ball into the water", his mind sees the image of the ball flying into the water.
Sentence.come: 2017年6月六级真题（第二套）听力 Section B

Sentence.sentence: They have to give so much thought and attention to the low-level mechanics of handling the ball, or fingering the keys or reading the music, that they are unable to give any thought to the thing that matters—the game, or the music, respectively.
Sentence.come: 2019年6月六级真题（第一套）听力 Section C

Sentence.sentence: What they don't need to do—what would be a distraction—is to have to think about where their fingers are, or how to control the ball while running.
Sentence.come: 2019年6月六级真题（第一套）听力 Section C

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这两个名词均有"舞会"之意。
means: ball ： 多指社交性的舞会，场面较为隆重和正式。
dance ： 指一般性的非正式舞会。

list.explanation: 十分难做的事，难得要命的工作

example.en: This job is a real ball-breaker.
The task I got assigned was a ball-buster. for sure.
example.zh: 毫无疑问，指派给我的那项仟务实在太艰巨了。

list.explanation: (监督执行艰巨工作的)残暴的领班、 监工或老板

example.en: The boss is a real ball-breaker, and I don't know how long I can go on with this job.
example.zh: 那老板实在太残暴了，我不知道这工作我还能继续干多久。

example.en: They have special management schools to train ball-breakers.
example.zh: 他们有专门教管理的训练机构，培训监管执行艰巨工作的工头。

list.explanation: (对待男子凶狠的)悍妇，泼妇，"雌老虎"

example.en: Tom told me about that wife of his. A real ball-buster. isn't she?
example.zh: 汤姆把他妻子的事告诉了我。她可真是个泼妇，不是吗？

list.explanation: (儿童玩的一种一摔即响的球形爆竹)摔炮

example.en: The kids had a very nice game ot golf balls.
example.zh: 孩子们玩摔炮玩得很痛快。

stems_affixes.word_buile: ball抛,舞,球+ad表名词→伴随舞蹈的歌谣
ballet芭蕾舞+rina女→ballerina演芭蕾舞的女演员
ball抛,舞,球+istics=istic学科→对抛出去的[线路]研究→弹道学
ball抛,舞,球+ot→来自投票用的小球

Sentence.sentence: I chose a red rubber ball-simple, universally available.
Sentence.come: 2018年高考英语全国卷3 阅读理解 阅读D 原文

Sentence.sentence: If a basketball star is, for example, trying to gain a high personal point total, he may take a shot himself when it would be better to pass the ball to a teammate, affecting the team's performance.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语北京卷 阅读理解 七选五 原文

Sentence.sentence: It took a few youthful and daring businessmen to get the ball rolling.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语全国卷3 阅读理解 阅读C 原文

Sentence.sentence: She was knocked down by a ball.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语北京卷 阅读理解 阅读A 选项

Sentence.sentence: You can play with all the dogs at the ball house.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语上海卷 听力 原文

Sentence.sentence: Paris of opponents hit the ball back and forth until one winner emerges from all who entered.
Sentence.come: 2020年考研真题（英语一）翻译 Section Ⅲ

舞会
发出（或投出、击出等）的一球
棒球（投手投出的）坏球

sentences.en: When the spun sugar balls,the candy has cooked sufficiently.
sentences.cn: 当棉花糖呈球状时，糖果就够火候了。

phrase.cizu_name: the ball is in your court

jx.jx_en_mean: it is up to you to make the next move
a person who is full of energy and enthusiasm
the rounded protuberant part of the foot at the base of the big toe
the rounded protuberant part of the hand at the base of the thumb

phrase.cizu_name: have a lot (或 not much) on the ball

jx.jx_en_mean: have a lot of (or not much) ability
maintain the momentum of an activity

phrase.cizu_name: keep one's eye on (或 take one's eye off) the ball

jx.jx_en_mean: keep (or fail to keep) one's attention focused on the matter in hand
jx.jx_cn_mean: 集中（或未能集中）注意力

jx.jx_en_mean: alert to new ideas, methods, and trends
play a ball game such as baseball or cricket

phrase.cizu_name: start (或 get , set) the ball rolling

jx.jx_en_mean: set an activity in motion; make a start

jx.jx_cn_mean: 警惕的，有能力的或有效率的

lj.lj_ly: a teacher who is really on the ball.

jx.jx_en_mean: Relating to qualities, such as competence, skill, or knowledge, that are necessary for success
jx.jx_cn_mean: 成功的必备条件：关于能力、技巧或知识等成功所必要的品质

lj.lj_ly: a manager who has a lot on the ball; a student who has nothing on the ball.
lj.lj_ls: 一个很能干的经理；一名什么也不会的学生

entry.def: A ball is a round object that is used in games such as tennis, baseball, football, basketball, and cricket.
A ball is something or an amount of something that has a round shape.

example.ex: Thomas screwed the letter up into a ball...
They heard a loud explosion and saw a ball of fire go up.
example.tran: 他们听见一声爆炸的巨响，看见一个火球腾空而起。

entry.def: When you ball something or when it balls, it becomes round.

example.ex: He picked up the sheets of paper, and balled them tightly in his fists...
example.tran: 他抓起那几张纸，在手里紧紧攥成团。

entry.def: The ball of your foot or the ball of your thumb is the rounded part where your toes join your foot or where your thumb joins your hand.
entry.tran: （脚趾和脚相连或拇指和手相连的）球状部位；脚趾球；拇指球

entry.def: A ball is a large formal social event at which people dance.
If you say that the ball is in someone's court, you mean that it is his or her responsibility to take the next action or decision in a situation.
entry.tran: 轮到…采取行动（或作出决断）

example.ex: The ball's now in your court — you have to decide what you're going to do.
example.tran: 轮到你了——你必须决定自己要做什么。

entry.def: If you get the ball rolling ,set the ball rolling, or start the ball rolling, you start something happening.
entry.tran: 使某事发生；开始某种活动

example.ex: He will go to the Middle East next week to get the ball rolling again on peace talks...
example.tran: 他下周将前往中东，开始重启和谈。

example.ex: I just want enough cash to start the ball rolling.
example.tran: 我只是想有足够的启动资金。

entry.def: If you are having a ball, you are having a very enjoyable time.

example.ex: Outside the boys were sitting on the ground and, going by the gales of laughter, they were having a ball.
example.tran: 男孩们在户外席地而坐，从阵阵笑声来看，他们玩得很开心。

entry.def: If you keep several balls in the air, you try to do several different things at once.

example.ex: The detective has to discover the motive, the means and the opportunity and has to keep these three balls in the air.
example.tran: 那名侦探必须查明动机、手段和时机，而且对这三项的调查必须同步展开。

example.ex: ...unhappy mothers trying to juggle ten balls in the air.
example.tran: 同时要做无数件事情的可怜的母亲

entry.def: If someone is on the ball, they are very alert and aware of what is happening.

example.ex: She really is on the ball; she's bought houses at auctions so she knows what she's doing.
example.tran: 她很精明干练；她通过拍卖购过房，所以知道自己在做什么。

entry.def: If someone refuses to play ball, they are unwilling to do what someone wants them to do.

example.ex: The association has threatened to withdraw its support if the banks and building societies refuse to play ball.
example.tran: 该协会威胁说如果银行和建屋互助会不配合的话，它将不再提供支持。

means.word_mean: 1. round object that is hit or thrown or kicked in games;

sentences.sentence: "the ball travelled 90 mph on his serve"
"the mayor threw out the first ball"
"the ball rolled into the corner pocket"

means.word_mean: 2. a solid ball shot by a musket;

sentences.sentence: "they had to carry a ramrod as well as powder and ball"

means.word_mean: 3. an object with a spherical shape;
4. the people assembled at a lavish formal dance;

sentences.sentence: "the ball was already emptying out before the fire alarm sounded"

means.word_mean: 5. one of the two male reproductive glands that produce spermatozoa and secrete androgens;

sentences.sentence: "she kicked him in the balls and got away"

means.word_mean: 6. a spherical object used as a plaything;

sentences.sentence: "he played with his rubber ball in the bathtub"

means.word_mean: 7. a compact mass;

sentences.sentence: "a ball of mud caught him on the shoulder"

means.word_mean: 8. a lavish formal dance
9. a more or less rounded anatomical body or mass; ball of the human foot or ball at the base of the thumb;

sentences.sentence: "he stood on the balls of his feet"

means.word_mean: 10. a ball game played with a bat and ball between two teams of 9 players; teams take turns at bat trying to score run;

sentences.sentence: "there was a baseball game on every empy lot"
"there was a desire for National League ball in the area"

means.word_mean: 11. a pitch that is not in the strike zone;

sentences.sentence: "he threw nine straight balls before the manager yanked him"

means.word_mean: 1. form into a ball by winding or rolling;

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English : from Old Norse bǫllr, of Germanic origin
early 17th cent.: from French bal 'a dance', from late Latin ballare 'to dance'; related to Greek ballizein 'to dance' (also ballein 'to throw')

sentences.cn: 舞会上,那位红妆女郎娇艳欲滴.
sentences.en: At the ball the lady in red appeared very charming, and gorgeous.

sentences.cn: 她的女仆帮她穿上参加舞会的晚礼服.
sentences.en: Her maid helped her to dress for the ball.

sentences.cn: 她是那个舞会中的美女.
sentences.en: She was the belle of the ball.

sentences.cn: 他们把自己打扮成牧羊人来参加化装舞会.
sentences.en: They dressed themselves up as shepherds for the fancy dress ball.

sentences.cn: 在舞会上我装扮成骑士.
sentences.en: I was dressed as a horseman at the ball.

sentences.cn: 我和怀特先生受到邀请参加舞会.
sentences.en: Mr. White and I were invited to the ball.

sentences.cn: 我们在塔湖玩了一周, 并参加了一次舞会.
sentences.en: We went to Lake Tahoe for a week, and we had a ball.

sentences.cn: 我认为您在舞会上的表现十分恶劣.
sentences.en: I think it's shocking the way you are having at the ball.

sentences.cn: 她唯一知道的就是舞会和她招来的那些情人.
sentences.en: All she'll know about is the balls she went to and the beaux she collected.

sentences.cn: 我们都穿着节日的盛装去参加舞会.
sentences.en: We all wore festival costumes to the ball.

sentences.cn: 她盛装打扮好像要去参加舞会似的.
sentences.en: She made a grand toilet as if for a ball.

sentences.cn: 不过就这么一次,要知道, 这次舞会很重要啊!
sentences.en: But, just this once After all, this ball is very important.

sentences.cn: 化装舞会上的许多跳舞者戴着五颜六色的面具.
sentences.en: Many of the dancers at the fancy dress ball wore colourful masks.

sentences.cn: 果然,在托伐从舞会回来看到柯洛克斯泰的信时,危机就爆发了.
sentences.en: This crisis came when Torvald read Krogstad's letter after their return from the Ball.

sentences.cn: 她见过关于在谢丽饭店举行舞会 、 聚会 、 大型舞会和晚宴的通告.
sentences.en: She had seen notices of dances, parties, balls, and suppers at Sherry's.
sentences.from: 英汉文学 - 嘉莉妹妹

sentences.cn: 他从来不在跳舞会上露面.
sentences.en: He never shows up at balls.

sentences.cn: 我们要开一个化装舞会.
sentences.en: We are going to have a masked ball.

sentences.cn: 兹订于本周末举行舞会.
sentences.en: This is to announce the ball on the weekend.

sentences.cn: 一天,莫林接受邀请,要去参加一个化装舞会.
sentences.en: One day Merlin received an invitation to attend a fancy dress ball.

sentences.cn: 您有没有去参加化装舞会?
sentences.en: Did you go to the masquerade ball?
sentences.from: 常春藤生活英语杂志-2006年2月号

sentences.cn: 在1812年的第二届就职舞会上,白宫用于招待的食物中就有冰激淋.
sentences.en: Ice Cream was served in the Whitehouse, in 1812 at the second Inaugural Ball.

sentences.cn: 大家都参加了这个舞会.
sentences.en: All the world and his wife were at the ball.

sentences.cn: 要是有个英俊的小伙子邀请我做他的舞会搭档就好了.
sentences.en: If only some handsome boy invited me to be his partner at the ball.

sentences.cn: 只是为了礼节上的应酬,我们不得不参加这次舞会.
sentences.en: We will have to attend the ball just as a matter of form.

sentences.cn: 很多男人鱼和美人鱼都来参加这场舞会.
sentences.en: Many mermen and mermaids went to the ball.

sentences.cn: 我和怀特先生应邀参加了舞会.
sentences.en: Mr. White and I invited to the ball.

sentences.cn: 她既没时间也没钱参加舞会.
sentences.en: She has neither time nor money for the ball.

sentences.cn: 不过, 就只这么一次. 这次舞会毕竟很重要.
sentences.en: But, just this once. all, this ball is very important.

sentences.cn: 舞会是公开的, 欢迎各界人士自由参加.
sentences.en: The ball was public, and all sorts of persons were admitted and encouraged to come.

sentences.cn: 人们装扮成各种动物的样子去出席劳拉的家庭舞会.
sentences.en: People were dressed up as all kinds of animals and went to attend Laura's family ball.

sentences.cn: 他们在聚会上尽情地玩乐.
sentences.en: They all had a ball at the party.

sentences.cn: 雨停后, 孩子们尽情地玩球.
sentences.en: After the rain, the boys blew off steam with a ball game.

Sentence.sentence: You may have heard some of the fashion industry horror stories: models eating tissues or cotton balls to hold off hunger, and models collapsing from hunger-induced heart attacks just seconds after they step off the runway.

Sentence.come: 2019年12月四级真题（第三套）阅读 Section C

Sentence.sentence: While ones in physics say:" How can you predict where the ball you tossed will land?"
